alert.note: Alert for Jefferson; Walker (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued April 16 at 4:53AM CDT until April 18 at 8:00AM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM CDT THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of central Alabama, including the following counties, Blount, Jefferson and Walker. * WHEN...Until 800 AM CDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 453 AM CDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. This will cause urban and small stream flooding. Between 1 and 3 inches of rain have fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts up to 1 inch are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Birmingham, Homewood, Mountain Brook, Trussville, Gardendale, Irondale, Fultondale, Sumiton, Center Point, Pinson, Tarrant, Warrior, Kimberly, Graysville, Morris, Brookside, Sipsey, Cardiff, Arkadelphia and Forestdale.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
